content: who says crochet can t go on your wall this is a fast crochet flower pattern that looks amazing on your wall note this is a listing for a downloadable pdf pattern to crochet your own crochet wallflower > please note that this pattern is > available for free on my blog here 1 > the benefit of purchasing this pdf is > an easy to read printable and > ad-free version of the pattern materials needed worsted weightyarn crochet hook size g6/4 mm tapestry needle flower measures approximately 7 across pattern will be available for instant download upon payment the pattern and photographs of this design are the property of crochet 365 knit too this pattern and design are subject to copyright and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not distribute or sell this pattern under any circumstances due to the nature of the product there will be no refunds after purchase 1 https //www crochet365knittoo com/crochet-wallflower/
